name: IncrediBots 2 Saved Challenge File
summary: Learn about .IB2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: IncrediBots 2 does not save IB2 files directly. Instead, when saving a challenge, the game provides a plain text string that can be copied into a text file and later loaded back into the game. While the .TXT extension could be used, a recommended file extension for these save files is ".ib2," which stands for IncrediBots 2.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
